protocol.text: Wild-type and actin2-5 seedlings were grown on half strength Murashige & Skoog medium for 8 days before harvest and storage at -80 °C
RNA was isolated with TriReagent and Plant RNA Isolation Aid (Ambion), followed by cleanup with RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen).
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 4 �g total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 15 ug of biotinylated cRNA were hybridized to Affymetrix chips (GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array). Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM 2-(N-morpholino)ethanesulfonic acid, 1 M Na+, and 20mM of EDT
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
GeneChip intensities were background-corrected, normalized and sumarized by RMA method, using the “Affy” package from Bioconductor.
